root.name: No Gravity
root.description: OverviewNo Gravity is a Space Shooter for the PSP platform. The title originally started out as a Homebrew development project by Realtech VR. The game was found by publisher Anozor, and will be debuting as a downloadable game on the PlaystationStore for a tentative 2008 release date. The game features 3rd and 1st person ship piloting perspectives. Five different ships with three possible paint jobs are also being offered in-game, along with 6 weapon types with upgrades. According to the Anozor website, there will be 32 different missions with two difficulty levels each, along with several secret missions. The game will be available in English, Dutch, German, Spanish and French.On February 19th, 2009, Anozor released a new trailer through YouTube that directed users back to Anozor's website for release information. No Gravity's release has been slated for February 26th, 2009. The game will be released in English, German, French, Dutch, Spanish, and Portuguese. Music for the game is provided by Freebeat Music Records.
